mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing the Mercer County Fair with Crystal Gayle and Swing Kings, Kenny Price, Jim Ed Brown, Ralph Emery, Johnny Carver, Billie Jo Spears and Dotsy, Dixie Echoes, and the Cochran Family. Poster features metal photoplates of Crystal Gayle and Swing Kings, Kenny Price, Jim Ed Brown, Ralph Emery, Johnny Carver, Billie Jo Spears and Dotsy, Dixie Echoes, and the Cochran Family. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20752.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
